list.name: Replica started
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

options.content:
This dashboard collects the most important IC metrics for the [Subnet Load Tester](https://github.com/dfinity/subnet-load-tester).

To capture all results for later analysis, in Safari click `File > Export as PDF…`

panels.description: The rate at which canisters access new locations in memory requires the corresponding page to be fetched.
panels.title: Accessed bytes per second

panels.description: The rate at which canisters write to new locations in memory producing dirty pages that need to be saved.
panels.title: Dirty bytes per second

panels.description: The number of DTS executions per round.
panels.title: DTS executions per round

panels.description: The number of all canister in a subnet.
panels.title: Total canisters

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

targets.legendFormat: Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

panels.description: Basic CPU info

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: CPU Basic

panels.description: The average duration of executing a message in the sandbox process
panels.title: Sandboxed execution duration

panels.description: The total message execution duration in the replica controller
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_execute

panels.description: The time until sending an execution request to the sandbox process
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_execute_prepare

panels.description: The time from sending an execution request to receiving response
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_execute_wait

panels.description: The time to finalize execution in the replica controller
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_execute_finish

panels.description: The time from receiving an execution request to finishing execution
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sandbox_execute

panels.description: The time spent in the sandbox's worker thread responsible for actually performing the executions
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sandbox_execute_run

panels.description: The time to spawn a sandbox process
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_spawn_process

panels.description: The total create execution state duration in the replica controller
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_create_exe_state

panels.description: Time taken to send a create execution state request and get a response when compiling
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_create_exe_state_wait_compile

panels.description: Time taken to send a create execution state request and get a response when deserializing
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_create_exe_state_wait_deserialize

panels.description: Time to create an execution state after getting the response from the sandbox
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_replica_create_exe_finish

panels.description: Time taken to deserialize a wasm module when creating the execution state from a serialized module
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sandbox_create_exe_state_deserialize

panels.description: Total time spent in the sandbox when creating an execution state from a serialized module
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sandbox_create_exe_state_deserialize_total

panels.description: Number of pages accessed by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_accessed_pages

panels.description: Number of pages modified (dirtied) by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_dirty_pages

panels.description: Number of write accesses handled where the page had already been read by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_read_before_write_count

panels.description: Number of write accesses handled where the page had not yet been read by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_direct_write_count

panels.description: Total number of currently allocated pages
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_allocated_pages

panels.description: Size of the largest compiled wasm function in a canister by number of wasm instructions
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_largest_function_instruction_count

panels.description: The duration of Wasm module compilation including validation and instrumentation
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_wasm_compile_time_seconds

panels.description: The maximum function complexity in a wasm module
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_wasm_max_function_complexity

panels.description: Number of signal faults handled during the execution by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sigsegv_count

panels.description: Number of calls to mprotect during the execution by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_mprotect_count

panels.description: Number of calls to mmap during the execution by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_mmap_count

panels.description: Number of calls to pages memcopied during the execution by type of memory (wasm, stable) and api type
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_copy_page_count

panels.description: The total time spent in SIGSEGV signal handler in seconds
panels.title: sandboxed_execution_sigsegv_handler
